mapper.sql: MbrWineCustomOrder.id as id, MbrWineCustomOrder.winery_id as winery_id, MbrWineCustomOrder.mbr_id as mbr_id, MbrWineCustomOrder.custom_total_cnt as custom_total_cnt, MbrWineCustomOrder.pay_total_amt as pay_total_amt, MbrWineCustomOrder.pay_real_amt as pay_real_amt, MbrWineCustomOrder.order_status as order_status, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_detail_addr as shipping_detail_addr, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_province_id as shipping_province_id, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_city_id as shipping_city_id, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_county_id as shipping_county_id, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_person_name as shipping_person_name, MbrWineCustomOrder.shipping_person_phone as shipping_person_phone, MbrWineCustomOrder.transaction_no as transaction_no, MbrWineCustomOrder.order_no as order_no, MbrWineCustomOrder.create_date as create_date, MbrWineCustomOrder.modify_date as modify_date
mapper.insert: insert into m_mbr_wine_custom_order (id, winery_id, mbr_id, custom_total_cnt, pay_total_amt, pay_real_amt, order_status, shipping_detail_addr, shipping_province_id, shipping_city_id, shipping_county_id, shipping_person_name, shipping_person_phone, transaction_no, order_no, create_date, modify_date) values (#{id}, #{wineryId}, #{mbrId}, #{customTotalCnt}, #{payTotalAmt}, #{payRealAmt}, #{orderStatus}, #{shippingDetailAddr}, #{shippingProvinceId}, #{shippingCityId}, #{shippingCountyId}, #{shippingPersonName}, #{shippingPersonPhone}, #{transactionNo}, #{orderNo}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
update m_mbr_wine_custom_order
winery_id = #{wineryId},
mbr_id = #{mbrId},
custom_total_cnt = #{customTotalCnt},
pay_total_amt = #{payTotalAmt},
pay_real_amt = #{payRealAmt},
order_status = #{orderStatus},
shipping_detail_addr = #{shippingDetailAddr},
shipping_province_id = #{shippingProvinceId},
shipping_city_id = #{shippingCityId},
shipping_county_id = #{shippingCountyId},
shipping_person_name = #{shippingPersonName},
shipping_person_phone = #{shippingPersonPhone},
transaction_no = #{transactionNo},
order_no = #{orderNo},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
where id = #{id}
